TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
An emissary from the Wood Elves of Silvermyr has just arrived.
An emissary from the Wood Elves of Silvermyr has just arrived.
An emissary from the Wood Elves of Silvermyr has just arrived.
An emissary from the Wood Elves of Silvermyr has just arrived.
Are they sending us help?
Are they sending us help?
Are they sending us help?
Are they sending us help?
Actually, they have asked for OUR help. A foul creature has sealed the road into Silvermyr, and will not let anyone pass. It was sheer luck that the emissary made it through.
Actually, they have asked for OUR help. A foul creature has sealed the road into Silvermyr, and will not let anyone pass. It was sheer luck that the emissary made it through.
Actually, they have asked for OUR help. A foul creature has sealed the road into Silvermyr, and will not let anyone pass. It was sheer luck that the emissary made it through.
Actually, they have asked for OUR help. A foul creature has sealed the road into Silvermyr, and will not let anyone pass. It was sheer luck that the emissary made it through.
But we have no one to spare!
But we have no one to spare!
But we have no one to spare!
But we have no one to spare!
Unfortuately, we must help. If the free people of Etheria are to survive this blight that is upon us, we must do so together.
Unfortuately, we must help. If the free people of Etheria are to survive this blight that is upon us, we must do so together.
Unfortuately, we must help. If the free people of Etheria are to survive this blight that is upon us, we must do so together.
Unfortuately, we must help. If the free people of Etheria are to survive this blight that is upon us, we must do so together.
I'll go, your Majesty. And I'll return as quickly as possible.
I'll go, your Majesty. And I'll return as quickly as possible.
I'll go, your Majesty. And I'll return as quickly as possible.
I'll go, your Majesty. And I'll return as quickly as possible.
I knew you would understand. Defeat this creature and then let Queen Titania of Silvermyr know the road is clear once more. She will reward you handsomely.
I knew you would understand. Defeat this creature and then let Queen Titania of Silvermyr know the road is clear once more. She will reward you handsomely.
